org.apache.naming

类 ContextBindings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.naming.ContextBindings

  • public class ContextBindings
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the associations :
    • Catalina context name with the NamingContext
    • Calling thread with the NamingContext
    作者:
    Remy Maucherat

    • 字段概要

      • bindContext

        public static void bindContext(java.lang.Object name,
                               javax.naming.Context context)
        Binds a context name.
        参数:
        name - Name of the context
        context - Associated naming context instance
